categories: Category:Sith acolytes and apprentices of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: The Sith Lord Necus had an apprentice who was killed in the second-floor library of the Sith Academy on Korriban by another apprentice, Esorr Kayin. Necus always suspected Kayin's role in his apprentice's death, but as Kayin was the apprentice of a Dark Council member, Necus could do nothing until there was evidence confirming Kayin's culpability.
